scripts.preinstall: node -e "require('child_process').execSync('corepack enable && corepack prepare pnpm@8.15.4 --activate',{stdio:'inherit'})" || echo corepack-skip
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter web dev || npm run -w apps/web dev
scripts.build: pnpm --filter web build || npm run -w apps/web build
scripts.start: pnpm --filter web start || npm run -w apps/web start
